common.securityNoticeDesc: 1. External wallets are for storage payments. 2. The Privacy Layer (Optional) uses a Master Password to encrypt files locally and protect Arweave keys. If not active, uploads will be public.
common.unlockRequired: Privacy protection is currently inactive. Activate to enable E2EE features.

unlock.title: Activate Secure Vault
unlock.desc: Enter your master password to unlock identities and enable file encryption.
unlock.initDesc: This is your first time. Set a master password to protect your identities and enable end-to-end file encryption.
unlock.warning: Your password is never sent to any server. It is used locally to derive your encryption keys.
unlock.forgotWarning: ⚠️ Important: If you forget this password, you will lose access to your encrypted files and saved identities forever.
unlock.errorLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
unlock.successInit: Master password set and vault initialized

history.title: Your Permaweb History

history.errorLocked: Identity Layer is locked. Unlock to decrypt.
